headline: Teledyne Completes Acquisition of TransponderTech from Saab
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., October 31, 2025--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) ("Teledyne") announced today the successful completion of the acquisition of the TransponderTech business from Saab AB. The newly acquired business Teledyne FLIR TransponderTech AB will join Teledyne’s Raymarine, FLIR Marine, ChartWorld and Teledyne CARIS brands, broadening the group’s maritime technology solutions.
